release.action: Added code to make hypotheses and conclusions (in the InvestigationCollection) in the random xml generator.
Renamed FuGE-profile.mdzip to FuGE-v1-profile.mdzip to match the name of the mdzip file when downloaded on its own
Added Identifier Maker code, allowing users to generate a variety of identifiers.
Added classes to generate Random XML
Added example classes for inputting/outputting XML.
Created the subversion repository and this documentation. It is all still at an early stage, and needs work. Please contact fuge-devel@lists.sourceforge.net if you have any suggestions or comments.
